content: What would you say if I asked you to come over right now?
Every message you send me is like a small gift
I find it incredibly sexy that you’ve been patient with me about taking things slowly. Trust me, I’m worth the wait!
I can’t go to sleep because when I close my eyes, I see your beautiful face!

I am so lucky to have you by my side. Everything you do for me never goes unnoticed. Reading your sweet love paragraphs makes me really happy. I am eternally grateful to have your support, and affection.
If I had a candy bar for every time I thought of you, I would be fat
For some reason every love song makes me think of you…
Even birds don’t sing today, they also miss the most stunning person in the world, come back to me faster!
If nothing lasts forever, I was wondering if you would be my nothing?
A day without sunshine is a day without you
Forget everything that surrounds you. Think that there’s just you and me in this wide world.
Each time I see you, your smile gives me light
If you were a bullet I would shoot myself to have you in me.
How do you manage to look so stunning every day? When I look at you, I become speechless.
Hey, boy, are you a camera? I smile every time I look at you.
I believe in following my dreams. Can I have your Instagram?
Are you a bank loan? Because you got my interest.
You remind me of my next girlfriend.
I think the only way you could possibly be more beautiful is if I got to know you.
Your name is my favorite word.
If kisses were snowflakes, I’d send you a blizzard.
Are you Google? Cause I just found what I’m looking for.
Do you breathe oxygen? We have so much in common.
Single and looking… anyone wanna be found?
Are you a time traveler? Because I absolutely see you in my future.
Roses are red, bananas are yellow, wanna go out with a nice little fellow?
You know, they say that love is when you don’t want to sleep because reality is better than your dreams. And after seeing you, I don’t think I ever want to sleep again.
Are you tired? Because you’ve been running through my mind all day.
I’m really glad I just bought life insurance, because when I saw you, my heart stopped.
I never believed in love at first sight, but that was before I saw you.
Would you mind giving me a pinch? You’re so cute, I must be dreaming
Do you like raisins? How about a date?
When I text you goodnight later, what phone number should I use?
Do you believe in love at first sight or should I walk by again?
Can I borrow a quarter? What for? I want to call my mother and tell her I just met the girl of my dreams.
Do you have a map? I just got lost in your eyes.
Oops! I lost my mobile number! Could I have yours?
If being sexy was a crime, you’d be guilty as charged.
Want to go outside and get some fresh air with me? You just took my breath away
Can’t wait until tomorrow, because I bet that you get more and more beautiful every day.
You love flowers, but you cut them. You love animals, but you eat them. You tell me you love me, so now I’m scared!
Did you just come out of the oven? Because you’re hot.
I was feeling a little off today—but you’ve turned me on again!
I’m studying to become a historian. I’m especially interested in finding a date.
Are you a magician? Because when I’m looking at you, you make everyone else disappear!
Is your dad a boxer? Because you’re a knockout!
I hope our love will be like the number Pi: irrational and endless!
I think there’s something wrong with my phone. Your number’s not in it.
You must be made of Copper and Tellurium—because you’re CuTe!
Life without you is like a broken pencil…pointless.
Something’s wrong with my eyes, because I can’t take them off you
You’re so sweet, you’re giving me a toothache
I don't have a girlfriend. I just know a girl who would get really mad if she heard me say that
I'll be Burger King and you be McDonald's. I'll have it my way, and you'll be lovin' it.
You may fall from the sky, you may fall from a tree, but the best way to fall... is in love with me
My love for you is like dividing by zero - it cannot be defined
Are you a keyboard? Because you're my type!
If I freeze, it's not a computer virus. I was just stunned by your beauty
Are you an exception? I bet I can catch you.
Can I borrow your cellphone? I need to call animal control cause I just saw a fox!
My name is John but you can call me tonight
Why did the lady wear a helmet every time she ate? She was on a crash diet!
Are your pants 50% off? Cuz they'll be 100% off in my room
Well at least your mom thinks you’re pretty
My imaginary friend says that you need a therapist
I never forget a face, but in your case, I’ll be glad to make an exception
When I need a pick me up, I just think of your laugh and it makes me smile
Sweet dreams… ...
If I had a candy bar for every time I thought of you, I would be fat
I heard that the best way to get over someone is to get under someone else
Clever as the Devil and twice as pretty
I’m a fish swimming by … catch me if you want me
From the first time I saw you, I’ve belonged to you completely. I still do. If you want me
By the way, I’m wearing the smile you gave me
When I need a pick me up, I just think of your laugh and it makes me smile
Making you horny and making you smile are my two favorite things
Hurry up, before there’s no more night left
Do you know what I look best in? Your strong arms!
Come live in my heart, and pay no rent
That one tickled. If electrocution is your way of flirting, I commend you on your originality
You already caught me, but every day, you pull me in deeper and deeper
If you stood in front of a mirror holding 11 roses; you will see 12 of the most beautiful things in this world
Now turn around and go to sleep. I’m warning you that I plan to sleep with you in my arms all night long
I’m jealous of everyone who will get to meet you today
My plan was not to fall in love, but I saw your smile and forgot my plans
Sweetheart, I have no intention of denying you a thing
You are the best decision my heart ever made
I’m afraid to lose you and you’re not even mine
Sex is a team sport, sugar
I loved you for a thousand years and missed you in all of them
I don’t mind hot and spicy. Actually find that appealing in a girl. And chicken wings
I want you to know that you’re the hottest biscuit this side of the gravy boat
Let’s be naughty and save Santa the trip
You are adorable, mademoiselle. I study your feet with the microscope and your soul with the telescope
I miss your smile
I had an amazing dream about you last night
I thought perfection is overrated, and then I met you
Do I dazzle you?
You and I have many pending sunrises
I wish you were here next to me right now
Calls you names, insults you or puts you down

Let me know if you need to get going. I don't want to take up all your time.
Well, if you ever want to chat again, I'm usually here [every Monday afternoon].
Let me give you my email address. If you're ever in the area again it'd be great to meet up
Feel free to call me if you want to hang out. Here, I'll give you my number.
I really enjoyed our chat. Thanks so much.
It was really nice meeting you.
I had a great time talking with you. Hope to see you again soon.
Actually, that happened to me once.
I totally agree. The same thing happened to me too.
That's pretty common. I heard that a lot of people had the same experience

Alright guys. Time for me to go. Have a good one
